data: Apple is a multinational technology company that designs, manufactures, and markets consumer electronics, computer software, and online services. Known for innovative products like iPhone, iPad, and Mac computers.
Microsoft is a leading software and cloud services company providing operating systems, productivity software, and cloud computing solutions through Azure, Office 365, and other enterprise products.

Alphabet Inc. is the parent company of Google, operating the world's leading search engine and offering advertising services, cloud solutions, and diverse technology investments through its various subsidiaries.
Amazon is a multinational e-commerce and cloud computing company, operating the largest online marketplace globally and providing Amazon Web Services (AWS) for cloud infrastructure and computing.

NVIDIA designs and manufactures graphics processing units (GPUs) and systems-on-a-chip units. The company is a leader in AI computing, gaming graphics, and data center solutions for artificial intelligence applications.
Tesla is an electric vehicle manufacturer and clean energy company specializing in the design, manufacturing, and sale of electric vehicles, batteries, and renewable energy products worldwide.

Meta Platforms (formerly Facebook) operates social media platforms including Facebook, Instagram, and WhatsApp. The company also focuses on developing virtual and augmented reality technologies through its metaverse initiative.

Berkshire Hathaway is a diversified holding company that invests in insurance, utilities, transportation, and other industries. Led by Warren Buffett, it manages a significant investment portfolio and operates multiple subsidiary companies.
Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company (TSMC) is the world's largest dedicated independent semiconductor foundry, manufacturing advanced microchips for companies like Apple, NVIDIA, and AMD.
Johnson & Johnson is a diversified healthcare company engaged in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of pharmaceuticals, medical devices, and consumer packaged goods for healthcare.
JPMorgan Chase is a multinational financial services company providing commercial banking, investment banking, and asset management services to corporations, institutions, and individuals worldwide.

Visa is a global payments technology company that operates the world's largest payment processing network, facilitating digital and physical transactions for millions of merchants, financial institutions, and cardholders.
Eli Lilly is a pharmaceutical company focused on developing medicines in endocrinology, oncology, immunology, cardiovascular disease, and other therapeutic areas to address serious health conditions.
Walmart is the world's largest retailer, operating a vast network of hypermarkets, supermarkets, and e-commerce platforms serving millions of customers globally with everyday low prices.
Procter & Gamble is a multinational consumer goods corporation manufacturing and marketing a wide range of products including personal care, cleaning products, and health and beauty items globally.
